title: Add incremental ingestion support (skip already-processed docs)
description:
Currently, ingestion either wipes all data (default) or creates duplicates (--no-clean).

Need incremental ingestion that:
1. Checks if document already exists by source path or content hash
2. Skips unchanged documents
3. Updates changed documents (delete old chunks, insert new)
4. Only processes truly new files

Implementation approach:
- Add content_hash field to documents collection (SHA256 of content)
- Before processing, query for existing doc by source path
- Compare hashes to detect changes
- If unchanged: skip
- If changed: delete old chunks, re-process
- If new: process normally

Location: src/ingestion/ingest.py
close_reason: Implemented incremental ingestion with content_hash tracking, skip/update logic, and --incremental CLI flag
